name: Tophs Crystal Caverns
description: A subterranean realm where glowing crystals flourish in clusters along walls and ceilings. The natural hum of earth resonates all around.

messages.enter: A gentle pulse ripples through the crystals as you step inside, acknowledging your presence.
messages.look: Varied crystals shimmer in mesmerizing hues, each formation carrying an echo of the earth's heartbeat.
